While I am not a hardcore Xp practitioner, I have used junit
extensively. =
I have been attempting to find an effective framework
that extends junit's =
capability to Web app testing. There are numerous
but in my mind their effe=
ctiveness is in question.

Recently I have been trying to create a sample o=
f automated tests for
our enterprise web application running on Oracle 9IAS=

My purp=
ose is to create a test that mimics the steps in a `Change

ect' . This would be created by the
developer and

 create the test cases.

Since these test case need to test a web applicati=
on, I researched and
finally focused on following three options. Note that =
while there are

=

JAKARTA CACTUS =96 While I have successfully created some tests with
Jakar=
ta Cactus Framework to create server side tests that have access

user's
browser experi=
ence.

fra=

Web appl=
ication testing. One of the primary issue is limited support

TESTMAKER =96 This is created and recommend by F=
rank Cohen in his
book
Java Testing and Design. My reservations with this t=

ers/testers.
It is also promoted as record/playback tool and such tools may=
 work

=
testing harness.

My question is :

1. Has anyone implemented automated tes=
ting harness for their

ant value to QA of

critical success factor is

our architecture/methodology of automated testing harness or

amework
